tossupQ:
GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice If you draw a triangle on a sphere such as a basketball, 
which of the following is TRUE: 
 
W) the sum of the 3 angles is greater than 180º 
X) the sum of the 3 angles is equal to 180º 
Y) the sum of the 3 angles is less than 180º 
Z) the triangle has negative curvature and is not considered a triangle
tossupA: W) THE SUM OF THE 3 ANGLES IS GREATER THAN 180º

GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following produces red-colored eyes in
